details: We made a CodeNarc screencast and a GroovyServ screencast, plus worked on Gradle plugins. Fun stuff.

title: Gradle Redux, CodeNarc, and Halloween Fest and Canoo
details: the November event we created 4 new CodeNarc rules, improved the easyb/junit integration, and made good progress on the FindBugs Gradle plugin.

title: Static Analysis Night
details: Wrote 4 new static analysis rules for the CodeNarc project. Great job everyone!

title: Jazoon
details: Improved @Log annotations added to Groovy, open JSF components created, and a Griffon plugin completed.

title: Geek Night at GR8 Conference
details: Created a Grails Elastic Search plugin, a Gradle PMD plugin, added improved support for IntelliJ IDEA to the Griffon and Gradle projects, and added a feature to Groovy called @Log.
